item.title: Debug Console on Xen
item.description: When debugging HaLVM domains, the writeDebugConsole function from Hypervisor.Debug is invaluable. However, in order to see the messages printed, you must enable the emergency console in Xen. This isn’t too difficult, but it’s not terribly well documented: there are many sources that describe parts of the process, but none that describe the whole thing.
